ripplers.advancements.bind_soul.title: Soul Bound
ripplers.advancements.bind_soul.descript: Set your respawn point by tempting a rippler onto a trimmed chorus flower using chorus fruit and interact with the trimmed chorus flower.
ripplers.rippler.fucking.died.message: Your rippler died meaning you can no longer respawn.
ripplers.perfectly_trimmed.title: Perfectly Trimmed
ripplers.perfectly_trimmed.desc: Trim a chorus flower by right clicking it with shears
